title: Looking for a senai!
body: Hi, my name is BerserkerBunnyx and I'm looking for some guidance, I've been playing league for about 4 months now and want to get into playing ranked! The thing is i'm worried i won't be good enough. I really need someone to teach me basics and fundamentals and what's different from ranked/ and normal que,! Help a brother out, I won't waste your time. :)

replies.body: I can teach you a few things,  add me, Dem Trolls
